title: LISTEN: Sunday Supplement podcast
description: Neil Ashton is joined by Henry Winter, Shaun Custis and Andy Dunn to discuss all the main talking points from the football world.
content: The trio kick off the show by discussing Philippe Coutinho's big money move to Barcelona and whether he is worth the reported Â£146m transfer fee and how Liverpool could fare after his departure.They also chat about the recent war of words between Chelsea manager Antonio Conte and Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho, and what - if anything - can be done to intervene.They also cast their spotlight on Mark Hughes' departure at Stoke and the arrival of Ross Barkley at Chelsea, with his former team-mate Mason Holgate also up for discussion after an incident with Roberto Firmino in Friday's FA Cup tie.Arsene Wenger's touchline ban and the potential introduction of VAR in the Premier League is also on the agenda.Download the podcast now or get it from your usual podcast provider.
